items.headline: China imposes export controls on 20 Japanese entities to curb ‘remilitarisation’ - Reuters
items.snippet: China imposes export controls on 20 Japanese entities to curb ‘remilitarisation’  ReutersChina issues dual-use blacklist of 20 Japanese entities  The Japan TimesMOFCOM restricts exports to 40 Japanese entities over military ties; Move a stepped-up response to security policy shift in the country: experts  Global TimesChina bans dual-use item exports to 20 Japan defense entities  Japan Wire by KYODO NEWSChina restricts exports to 40 Japanese entities with ties to military  NPRChina adds Japanese entities to export control list, turning up heat on Tokyo  South China Morning PostChina restricts exports to Japanese companies to curb 'remilitarization'  Nikkei AsiaChina’s export controls on certain Japanese entities ‘fully justified, reasonable and lawful’ to curb Tokyo’s ‘remilitarization’ push: MOFCOM  Global TimesChina adds 20 Japanese entities contributing to military buildup to export control list of dual-use items  Global Times
